Translations.Text: â€˜Among us bol submitters us bol compromisers. ' Mat rad for those submitted they bol na pravo chodnicek
Mat rad for compromisers they je kurivo Gehenna
they zostat riadne chodnicek my zehnat them abundant zavlazit
My iste test them all Mat rad for him disregards odkaz jeho Lord He rezirovat him vzdy zvacsit retribution
Miesto kult belong do GOD nie vola sa on ktokolvek inak GOD
When GOD's servant zastanca Him alone skoro all z them banded dohromady oppose him
Say ja kult len moj Lord ja never set any idols Him
Say ja nie possess power harm ona nor guide ona
Say Ziaden 1 chranit mna GOD nor mozem ja zalozit any inaksie refuge Him
Ja deliver GOD's proclamations odkaz Those disobey GOD Jeho posol incur zapalit Hell wherein they abide forever
Once they see co awaiting them they robit zalozit out kto je skutocne chaby v power fewer v zvazok
Say ja nie zauzlit co promised ona happen skoro al moj Lord zdrzat it for awhile
He bol Knower buduci; He nie reveal buduci ktokolvek
Len do posol He zvolit si robit He reveal minuly buduci specific zvest
This bol zistit lenze they delivered ich Lord's odkaz. He je fully aware z co they have He pocitat zvazok all things
